properties.areaDesc: Coastal waters from Okaloosa-Walton County Line to Pensacola FL out 20 NM; Waters from Okaloosa-Walton County Line to Pensacola FL from 20 to 60 NM; Coastal waters from Pensacola FL to Pascagoula MS out 20 NM; Waters from Pensacola FL to Pascagoula MS from 20 to 60 NM
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 10 at 3:54AM CST until January 10 at 9:00PM CST by NWS Mobile AL
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Gale Warning, southeast winds 20 to 30 kt with
frequent gusts between 35 to 40 kt and seas 8 to 13 feet
expected. For the Small Craft Advisory today, southeast winds 15
to 25 kt with gusts up to 35 kt and seas 6 to 9 feet. For the
Small Craft Advisory Saturday afternoon, southwest winds 15 to
20 kt with gusts up to 30 kt and seas 9 to 11 feet expected.

* WHERE...Coastal waters from Pensacola FL to Pascagoula MS out
20 NM, Coastal waters from Okaloosa Walton County Line FL to
Pensacola FL out 20 NM, Waters from Pensacola FL to Pascagoula
MS from 20 to 60 NM and Waters from Okaloosa Walton County
Line FL to Pensacola FL from 20 to 60 NM.

* WHEN...For the Gale Warning, from 9 PM this evening to 3 PM CST
Saturday. For the Small Craft Advisory today, until 9 PM CST.
For the Small Craft Advisory Saturday afternoon, from 3 PM to 6
PM CST.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds will cause hazardous seas which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should alter plans to avoid these hazardous conditions.
Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course, and/or secure the
vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM CST THIS EVENING... ...GALE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM THIS EVENING TO 3 PM CST SATURDAY... ...SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 3 PM TO 6 PM CST SATURDAY
